name: BIG DIPPER (itch) (Vinison@DePaul)
description:
Jason "lil" Dipper is a young boy who is the son of a celebrity boxer, Daniel "Big" Dipper. Because of his father's influence and reputation, Jason struggles to find his own source of passion and identity. Especially since his father desires for him to become a famous boxer like he is.

This is  touch and explore game created on Bitsy.
